name: Fleet Defender
description:
In this game, you are a lone fighter defending a civilian convoy from alien attack. The convoy ships are at the bottom of the screen and enemy fire or ships that you let through will damage or destroy them.

I created this game quite a while ago, the sponsor that appears in the loading screens is out of business, if I'm not mistaken. So don't bother clicking the links as they are dead. I also seem to have lost the source code for this game.

Please leave a comment letting me know what you think about the game.
